Product Pains | Community Manager | San Francisco, CA

https://productpains.com INTERNS / REMOTE

Hi! Product Pains is a community dedicated to improving tech products. It's pre-launch but we have a rockstar product team (engineer + designer, both have worked at FB).

We're looking for a community manager to help solidify our launch strategy and share responsibility for building, managing, and growing the community from the get-go.

We're open to interns or remote work as long as you're the right fit. We love all talent, including the young and eager.

Email me at: andrew@productpains.com.
